EmailTemplate.name: Call 1st voicemail
EmailTemplate.subject: Re: VMTurbo
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Lead.FirstName},
I'm trying to connect with you for a quick second. I work at VMTurbo, a software company focused on proactive resource management for virtualized data centers. VMTurbo provides guided operational support by analyzing workload demands and resource capacities. The result of our real-time analytics is that workloads get the resources they need while maximizing the utilization of servers and storage. Our technology has been developed by a team of PhD's with over 100+ combined years of IT experience.
I'd really appreciate a moment of your time to understand your organization's financial and technical strategies regarding data center virtualization and explore with you whether VMTurbo could be a potential fit.
Best regards,
{!User.FirstName}{!User.LastName}
Phone: 781.373.3540 ~ Fax: 781.373.3257 Top 10 Reasons to Choose VMTurbo - http://tiny.cc/4kmu4
